name: Gift of Nature
details:
Gift of Nature grants the Life Power Tray and the following powers: Will O Wisps| Circle of Life| Ironwood Body
Increases Support Power by 225 per point spent.
You can now equip: Mystical Staves
New Mechanic: Essence Burn
Life Powers will generate Essence when used. If your Essence fills over 80% you will gain Essence Burn| causing you to take damage each second until you die or reduce your Essence under 80%.  Using powers in the Death Powers Tray will reduce your Essence.
WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Earthkeeper promotion class and prevents access to the Archdruid and Stormcaller promotion classes.
